snippet.title: Saturn — Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
"Saturn" is a tactical RPG set from Ninsar.Games in a futuristic world, where the hero can take control of robots and other machines. Expect a nonlinear storyline, dozens of isometric locations for exploration, and turn-based battles.

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2742840/Saturn/

VK Play:
https://vkplay.ru/play/game/saturn/
